allWorks.title: MCDELIVERY PH APP
allWorks.subtitle: Overcoming Delivery Challenges with Real-Time Solutions
allWorks.summary: Despite being one of the leading fast food chains in the Philippines, the McDelivery app has the lowest rating among its competitors. This case study explores the reasons behind this and proposes a solution based on the underlying issues.

allWorks.title: eNSAYO
allWorks.subtitle: A Web Platform with Interactive 3D Models and AR for Immersive Technical-Vocational Education and Training (TVET) Learning
allWorks.summary: eNSAYO is a web-based platform designed to enhance the TESDA Online Program by providing interactive supplementary learning materials. By integrating 3D technologies like augmented reality and immersive simulations, the platform transforms traditional learning experiences, ultimately boosting motivation and engagement for Technical and Vocational Education and Training (TVET) learners.
allWorks.users: TVET Students, TESDA Online Program Users

allWorks.title: eNSAYO
allWorks.subtitle: eNSAYO Redesign: Balancing Functionality and Design
allWorks.summary: This landing page redesign was driven by the need to simplify my front-end development process. As a web developer and aspiring UX designer, the challenge was to find the balance between my front-end development skills and delivering a visually appealing, clean, and simple interface. A key constraint was the limited availability of assets from our client, and to avoid copyright issues, I had to work with the resources we had.
allWorks.users: TVET Students, TESDA Online Program Users

allWorks.title: BAA BAA THAI TEA
allWorks.subtitle: Baa Baa Thai Tea Website Redesign: Adding Personality and Playfulness to its Landing Page
allWorks.summary: As my first Figma project, I redesigned the landing page for Baa Baa Thai Tea, a milk tea brand I love. Wanting to bring more personality and playfulness to their online presence, I reimagined their website to better reflect the brandâ€™s fun and lively character. This project was all about enjoying the process and getting hands-on with Figma.
allWorks.users: Baa Baa Thai Tea Website Visitors
